title: Irina Shayk works the camera as she slips into a blue silk nightie for fashion shoot
text:
She is lauded as an 'icon' in the fashion industry.

And Irina Shayk showed off for her modelling credentials as the face of lingerie brand Intimissimi's new knitwear campaign, called New Fibres.

With her brunette locks slicked back, the model, 33, posed up a storm for the camera as she showcased the Italian brand's collection.

Strike a pose: Irina Shayk showed off for her modelling credentials as she became the face of lingerie brand Intimissimi's new knitwear campaign

Irina slipped into a navy silk nightie with lacy hemline before showing off her satin bra underneath a sheer cashmere white jumper.

She teamed the look with white cropped trousers, a smart blazer and white GoGo boots.

Accessorising the lounge-wear with simple gold earrings and a bronzed make-up look, the model struck a number of poses for the camera.

For another look, Irina modelled a muted grey ribbed midi-dress, which hugged her slender figure.

The Russian beauty also posed in a matching grey polo neck, leggings and cardigan from the collection.

The mother-of-one oozed confidence as she worked the cameras in camel, black and khaki cashmere lounge-wear.

Subtle yet sophisticated: Neutral hues including camel formed the collection

The beauty is adjusting to life as a working single mother following her split from ex-fiancé, Hollywood actor Bradley Cooper, 44, in June after four years together.

The former couple have amicably agreed to share custody of their daughter Lea de Seine, two, and have both decided to live in New York so they can easily co-parent.

The model is said to be in no rush to move on from the relationship, and has reportedly told friends she is not yet ready to begin dating again.

Tremendous pins: Irina added a boost to her height with nude strappy heels

Cool: She also rocked patent military boots and an oversized hoodie

Focused on work: The beauty is adjusting to life as a working single mother following her split from ex-fiancé, Hollywood actor Bradley Cooper, 44, in June after four years together

Devoted mother: The former couple have amicably agreed to share custody of their daughter Lea de Seine, two, and have both decided to live in New York so they can easily co-parent

A source recently told E! News: 'She's focused on her daughter and spending time with her. She would like to meet someone in the future, but it's not a priority at the moment. She just got out of a long-term relationship and wants to take time to heal.'

Irina and Bradley began dating in mid-2015 after meeting at the Met Gala, and welcomed daughter Lea in March 2017.

Prior to their relationship, Bradley dated British model Suki Waterhouse, 27, while Irina was in a long-term romance with footballer Cristiano Ronaldo, 34.
